syntax_editor_macro.comments: This editor macro creates the code necessary to access the function contained in the SourceControlCommitToCurrentBranch script include.
syntax_editor_macro.name: SourceControlCommitToCurrentBranc
syntax_editor_macro.text: var SourceControlCommitToCurrentBranch = x_snc_devtools.SourceControlCommitToCurrentBranch; SourceControlCommitToCurrentBranch('x_your_scope','This is a commit message',false);
